mapper.insert: insert into t_mailing (mailing_id, mailing_aim_summary, begin_time, end_time, operator, create_time, update_time, delete_time, delete_flag, mailstats, mailnumber, mailing_templete_content) values (#{mailingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailingAimSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{mailStats,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{mailingTempleteContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_mailing set mailing_aim_summary = #{mailingAimSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, mailstats = #{mailStats,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mailnumber = #{mailNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mailing_templete_content = #{mailingTempleteContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where mailing_id = #{mailingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mailing_id, mailing_aim_summary, begin_time, end_time, operator, create_time, update_time, delete_time, delete_flag,mailstats, mailing_templete_content from t_mailing where mailing_id = #{mailingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select mailing_id, mailing_aim_summary, begin_time, end_time, operator, create_time, update_time, delete_time, delete_flag,mailstats, mailing_templete_content from oa..t_mailing
select max(mailing_id) as mailing_id from t_mailing
select mailing_id,mailstats,begin_time,end_time,mailing_aim_summary,mailing_templete_content from t_mailing order by mailing_id desc
